TopicTitle: Offensive Imagery by uAveVideo on Spacedock.

Articles.Content:
Hey, so I'm not really sure where to put this, because I'm not sure how to report this, because I dont know how to get in contact with the Spacedock moderators, but this person has been seriously disrupting the site. 

https://spacedock.info/profile/uAaveVideo

He's posted pedant Imagery and slander of the creator of KSS2 claiming that he "touches little girls." This should be delt with.
Update: The account was taken down!

On 6/13/2024 at 4:43 PM, Sky Kerman said:

Hey, so I'm not really sure where to put this, because I'm not sure how to report this, because I dont know how to get in contact with the Spacedock moderators, but this person has been seriously disrupting the site. 
[link redacted]
He's posted pedant Imagery and slander of the creator of KSS2 claiming that he "touches little girls." This should be delt with.

Maybe don't publicize offensive stuff with links and quotes?

Edited June 19 by DeadJohn
